Our Services

Comprehensive dental care for your entire family, delivered with compassion and expertise.

Our Services

Professional solutions tailored to your needs

Keep your whole family's smiles healthy with regular checkups designed for all ages. We focus on preventing problems before they start in a relaxed, friendly setting.

Thorough yet gentle cleanings remove plaque and tartar while our comprehensive exams catch issues early. Leave feeling refreshed with a brighter, healthier smile.

From professional whitening to veneers, we offer treatments that enhance your natural beauty. Achieve the confident smile you've always wanted.

Damaged or missing teeth? Our tooth-colored fillings, crowns, and implants restore both function and appearance seamlessly and comfortably.

Dental emergencies don't wait, and neither do we. Same-day appointments available for urgent issues like pain, broken teeth, or unexpected problems.

Meet Your Dental Team

Experienced, compassionate professionals dedicated to your family's oral health.

Dr. Sarah Mitchell

DDS, Lead Dentist

Dr. Mitchell brings over 15 years of experience in family and cosmetic dentistry. She's known for her gentle touch and ability to put even the most anxious patients at ease. A graduate of UNC Chapel Hill School of Dentistry, she's passionate about building lasting relationships with families in the community.

Dr. James Chen

DMD, Associate Dentist

Dr. Chen specializes in restorative dentistry and dental implants. His calm demeanor and thorough approach ensure patients understand every step of their treatment. When not in the office, he volunteers at local health fairs providing free dental screenings.

Insurance & Payment Options

We believe everyone deserves quality dental care. We work with most major insurance providers and offer flexible payment solutions.
